title: 'Termite house.. worthless service'
body: 'This is one of the most pathetic company which is just good on papers. They are unable to handle the returns and refunds. My return is not yet done and my whole house is infested with termite becuase of the sofa I purchased from Wakefit. Despite multiple escalataions and calls they dont work at all. A greedy company which wont survive in the long run as it is just a money sucking company. The return refund is a HOAX. After sales service is bad than even a grocery store. Worthless people working in a wortless company. NEGATIVE STARS FROM ME.... I WILL NEVER BUY FROM WAKEFIT.'

title: 'Quality Of Cushion Being used'
body: At the beginning of Purchase i was excited to buy an amazing product which was value for money and for that i have ignore some reviews as well like cushion used in seat and arm rest is of poor quality , it's been only 7-8 month to the purchase, i can experience wood structure underneath the cushion both in sitting and well keep arm on arm rest, Home Centre a brand which looks like reliable but not exactly, planning to buy Bed now shifting to shop near by rather than online purchase,  Thanks Home Centre for navigating us to go for purchase in old traditional way like it was  Value for money - yes it is Look - perfect Quality of fabric - okay Quality of Cushion inside - very pathetic

title: 'Sinks down to the frame in no time'
